subject: object granualarity
msgSnippet: Hi, Since there are few levels of object granularity in the business tier (for example, session bean , entity bean,hoem interface, DAO..value object..etc),
messageBody:
Hi,

Since there are few levels of object granularity in the business tier
(for example, session bean , entity bean,hoem interface, DAO..value
object..etc), does anyone has an experience of how to apply junit to
these effectively and properly ( e.g., no overlapping testing among
beans, skipping straightforward entity bean..etc).

Thanks,

Edmund
